comments:

- its contents appeared

- clicked on it

There are several interesting things shown above:

- stack 1: while trying to dispose the shell, it gets a WID exception on one of
the Menu
- stack 2: MenuItem.setText fails
  - we saw this before but couldn't figure out how it could happen
  - presumably the Menu doesn't think it's disposed, but the OS does
  - note that this is getting triggered from the command handler's use of the
filter event mechanism
- stack 3: the Workbench is trying to emergencyClose() here, but hits the first
case again
- stack 4: first case again

The gray "blank" view has been fixed in head.

I am unable to reproduce the exception -- it is likely that the exception was
being thrown as a side-effect of the blank view.

Please reopen if this continues to occur.
